title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: The Avengers assemble once more to undo the damage caused by Thanos in their previous battle and save the universe.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase his secret identity but inadvertently opens the multiverse.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Batman faces a new threat in the form of the masked terrorist Bane, who plans to destroy Gotham City.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: Max teams up with a mysterious woman to escape a post-apocalyptic wasteland while being pursued by a cult leader.

title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
plot: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises in the militant First Order.

title: Deadpool
plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: La La Land
plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: Logan
plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life until he meets a young mutant.

title: Get Out
plot: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Coco
plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: A Star Is Born
plot: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Joker
plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society, leading him into a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

title: Knives Out
plot: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
Two young British soldiers during the First World War are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory.

title: Soul
plot: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back.

title: Tenet
plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
plot: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Dune
plot: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: No Time to Die
plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help.

title: Encanto
plot: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: The Batman
plot: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
plot: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns, Jake must fight a difficult war against the humans.

title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
plot: Famed Southern detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece for his latest case.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
plot: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: He has burned through eight of his nine lives.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
plot: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy.

title: Oppenheimer
plot: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Barbie
plot: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
plot: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
plot: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
plot: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
plot: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

title: Past Lives
plot: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
plot: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s.

title: Wonka
plot: The story of how Willy Wonka became the greatest chocolate maker in the world.

title: Godzilla Minus One
plot: Postwar Japan is at its lowest point when a new crisis emerges in the form of a giant monster.

title: Dune: Part Two
plot: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: Inside Out 2
plot: Riley navigates new emotions as she enters her teenage years, with Joy and her friends learning to adapt.

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
plot: As the world falls, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great Biker Horde.

title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
plot: Many years after Caesar's reign, a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, while a young ape embarks on a journey.

title: A Quiet Place: Day One
plot: A prequel revealing the day the world went quiet as mysterious creatures attack humanity.

title: The Marvels
plot: Carol Danvers, Kamala Khan, and Monica Rambeau team up to face a new cosmic threat.

title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
plot: A young Coriolanus Snow mentors a tribute from District 12 in the 10th Hunger Games.

title: The Exorcist: Believer
plot: Two families are haunted by a demonic presence, leading to a battle against evil.

title: Fast X
plot: Dom Toretto and his family face a new threat that could destroy everything they hold dear.

title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
plot: Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with an unlikely ally to protect Atlantis from a powerful new threat.

title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part Two
plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team continue their mission to stop a global catastrophe.

title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
plot: Archaeologist Indiana Jones embarks on a new adventure to find a legendary artifact that could change the course of history.

title: Napoleon
plot: A look at the military commander's origins and his swift, ruthless climb to emperor, viewed through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his wife Josephine.

title: Elemental
plot: In a city where fire, water, land, and air residents live together, a fiery young woman and a go-with-the-flow guy discover something elemental: how much they actually have in common.

title: The Creator
plot: Amid a future war between the human race and the forces of artificial intelligence, a hardened ex-special forces agent finds the secret weapon: a robot in the form of a young child.

title: Wish
plot: A young girl named Asha wishes on a star and gets a more direct answer than she bargained for when a trouble-making star comes down from the sky to join her.

title: Poor Things
plot: The incredible tale about the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

title: The Holdovers
plot: A cranky history teacher at a prep school is forced to remain on campus over the holidays with a student who has no place to go.

title: Maestro
plot: The complex love story of Leonard Bernstein and Felicia Montealegre, spanning over 30 years.

title: Saltburn
plot: A student at Oxford University finds himself drawn into the world of a charming and aristocratic classmate.

title: Migration
plot: A family of ducks try to convince their overprotective father to go on the vacation of a lifetime.

title: The Iron Claw
plot: The true story of the inseparable Von Erich brothers, who made history in the world of professional wrestling.

title: Society of the Snow
plot: The story of the 1972 Andes flight disaster and the survivors' struggle for life.

title: Next Goal Wins
plot: Dutch-American football coach Thomas Rongen attempts the nearly impossible task of turning the American Samoa soccer team into winners.

title: The Zone of Interest
plot: The commandant of Auschwitz strives to build a dream life for his family in a house next to the camp.

title: Anatomy of a Fall
plot: A woman is suspected of her husband's murder, and their blind son faces a moral dilemma as the main witness.

title: The Boy and the Heron
plot: A young boy named Mahito, yearning for his mother, ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead.

title: The Beekeeper
plot: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful organization known as Beekeepers.

title: Argylle
plot: A reclusive author who writes espionage novels about a secret agent and a global spy syndicate discovers the plot of her books mirrors real-life events.

title: Lisa Frankenstein
plot: A misunderstood teenager and a reanimated Victorian corpse embark on a murderous journey to find love, happiness, and a few missing body parts.

title: Madame Web
plot: Cassandra Webb develops psychic abilities and must protect three young women from a mysterious adversary.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
plot: Po must train a new warrior when he's chosen to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace.

title: The Whale
plot: A reclusive English teacher living with severe obesity attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

title: Tár
plot: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors.

title: Suzume
plot: A 17-year-old girl named Suzume helps a mysterious young man close doors from the other side that are releasing disasters all over Japan.

title: The Banshees of Inisherin
plot: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both.

title: Asteroid City
plot: Following a writer on his world-famous fictional play about a grieving father who travels with his tech-obsessed family to small rural Asteroid City to compete in a junior stargazing event.

title: Evil Dead Rise
plot: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons.

title: Blue Beetle
plot: An alien scarab chooses college graduate Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing the teenager with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary powers.

title: The Nun II
plot: 1956 – France. A priest is murdered. An evil is spreading. The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

title: Wish Dragon
plot: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

title: The Little Mermaid
plot: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

title: Minari
plot: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of their own American Dream.

title: Sound of Metal
plot: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when he begins to lose his hearing.

title: Promising Young Woman
plot: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

title: The Father
plot: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones.

title: Nomadland
plot: A woman in her sixties who, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
plot: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
plot: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

title: Judas and the Black Messiah
plot: Offered a plea deal by the FBI, William O'Neal infiltrates the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party to gather intelligence on Chairman Fred Hampton.

title: The French Dispatch
plot: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth-century French city.

title: Don't Look Up
plot: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

title: CODA
plot: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

title: The Lost Daughter
plot: A woman's beach vacation takes a dark turn when she begins to confront the troubles of her past.

title: The Lost City
plot: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

title: The Adam Project
plot: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future.

title: Turning Red
plot: A thirteen-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

title: The Northman
plot: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is brutally murdered by his uncle, who kidnaps the boy's mother.

title: Lightyear
plot: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg.

title: Scream VI
plot: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.
An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

title: Missing
plot: After her mother goes missing, a young woman tries to find her from thousands of miles away using technology.

title: Air
plot: Follows the history of shoe salesman Sonny Vaccaro, and how he led Nike in its pursuit of the greatest athlete in the history of basketball: Michael Jordan.

title: The Flash
plot: Barry Allen uses his super speed to change the past, but his attempt to save his family creates a world without superheroes.

title: Haunted Mansion
plot: A woman and her son enlist a motley crew of so-called spiritual experts to help rid their home of supernatural squatters.

title: The Covenant
plot: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

title: The Killer
plot: After a fateful near-miss, an assassin battles his employers, and himself, on an international manhunt he insists isn't personal.

title: Nyad
plot: The remarkable true story of athlete Diana Nyad, who, at the age of 60, became the first person to complete a 110-mile swim from Cuba to Florida.

title: Leave the World Behind
plot: A family's vacation is upended when two strangers arrive at night, seeking refuge from a cyberattack that grows more terrifying by the minute.

title: The Power of the Dog
plot: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

title: The Green Knight
plot: A fantasy re-telling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
plot: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland.

title: The Worst Person in the World
plot: Chronicles four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path.

title: Licorice Pizza
plot: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and falling in love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

title: Nope
plot: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

title: The Fabelmans
plot: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of movies helps us see the truth about each other and ourselves.

title: Babylon
plot: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, tracing the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

title: The Woman King
plot: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

title: The Sea Beast
plot: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters.

title: The Black Phone
plot: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

title: The Last Duel
plot: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
plot: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

title: Triangle of Sadness
plot: A cruise for the super-rich sinks thus leaving survivors, including a fashion model celebrity couple, trapped on an island.

title: Aftersun
plot: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier.

title: The Menu
plot: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

title: The Lost Daughter
plot: A woman's beach vacation takes a dark turn when she begins to confront the troubles of her past.

title: CODA
plot: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

title: Don't Look Up
plot: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

title: The French Dispatch
plot: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth-century French city.
